de.gnwi.jdpd.accumulators

Class ForceAccumulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gnwi.jdpd.accumulators.ForceAccumulator

  • public class ForceAccumulator
extends java.lang.Object
    Force accumulator that uses (and changes) the particle related arrays ParticleArrays.getF_x/getFtwo_x, ParticleArrays.getF_y/getFtwo_y and ParticleArrays.getF_z/getFtwo_z for accumulative ("+=" and "-=") operations.
    Author:
    Achim Zielesny

    • Method Detail

      • accumulate_f_and_fTwo

        public boolean accumulate_f_and_fTwo(java.util.LinkedList<HarmonicBondChunkArrays> aBondChunkArraysList,
                                     double[] aR_x,
                                     double[] aR_y,
                                     double[] aR_z,
                                     Parameters aParameters)
        Accumulates forces to aParameters.getParticleArrays().getF_x() etc. and aParameters.getParticleArrays().getFtwo_x() etc. NOTE: No checks are performed.
        Parameters:
        aBondChunkArraysList - List of bond chunk arrays (may be null)
        aR_x - Current x-components of particle positions in simulation box
        aR_y - Current y-components of particle positions in simulation box
        aR_z - Current z-components of particle positions in simulation box
        aParameters - Parameters
        Returns:
        True: Operation successful, false: Otherwise
